amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to pursue any additional legal ways to transfer Federal lands to private owners in contravention of existing law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A090) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 239 (Roll no. 473).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A090) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 239 (Roll no. 473).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A090) offered by Mr. Polis.
